    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MoveControl getInstance()

      • move

        public java.lang.String move​(java.lang.String name)
        This method gets a player name and moves this player corresponding to the total roll that player rolled. It uses NormalMove UpDownMove ReverseMove.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player that are going to change location.
        Returns:
        The name of the square that the player moved.

      • getTotalRoll

        public int getTotalRoll​(java.lang.String name)
        This method calculates the total face values of the given player.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player that we want to get total roll of.
        Returns:
        total of the face values of the given player

      • checkSecondTurn

        public boolean checkSecondTurn​(java.lang.String name)

      • updateDoubleCounter

        public void updateDoubleCounter​(java.lang.String name)

      • checkMoveConditions

        public boolean checkMoveConditions​(java.lang.String name)
        This method checks whether the player rolled third double, or in jail, or rolled triple or rolled bus. Then does corresponding actions of them and returns false. If these are not the case simply returns true. For example, it returns false(does not allow to move) and sends the player to jail because the player rolled three double in same turn.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player that will move.
        Returns:
        true if all pre-conditions of move is happened, if not returns false.
